```py
from sagemaker.pytorch import PyTorch

# define the training job
estimator = PyTorch(
    entry_point='train.py',
    source_dir='./source_dir',
    framework_version='1.13.1',
    role='<arn role>',
    py_version='py39',
    job_name='demo',
    instance_type='ml.g5.xlarge',
    instance_count=1
)

# deploy the job to the cloud
estimator.fit()
```
